version_description:
- Holiday Faces!!! Santa, Snowman, New Years Baby
- Improved Sharing
- Critical Bug Fixes

- new old guy face
- new smushed face mode
- speed enhancements for older devices
- delete photo/video option for save
- bug fixes ( jitter reduction, photo orientation fix )

- new faces, new mode
- parental controls & safe search improvements
- bug fixes and improvements

- lots of new effects
- "Costume Booth" - mix and match hats, glasses, beards for >1000 combinations
- new UI, Icon
- improved face detection
- improved face jitter and tracking
- better blending of faces in mask / photo mode
- various bug fixes
- video cropping tool
- draw on and add text to your photos
- big update to face editor - much more useable now

2.1:
- Face Goo! warp your face just by touching it.. plus 10 warp presets to play with.
- 2 Halloween filters
- more bug fixes

2.0:
- lots of new effects
- "Costume Booth" - mix and match hats, glasses, beards for >1000 combinations
- new UI, Icon
- improved face detection
- improved face jitter and tracking
- better blending of faces in mask / photo mode
- various bug fixes
- video cropping tool
- draw on and add text to your photos
- big update to face editor - much more useable now

2.1.1
- Face goo is now animated, +2 more presets
- Increased strictness of image search filters for a safer search experience
- Minor bug fixes

Email us at labs@laan.com with any feedback or questions!

2.1 / 2.0
- Face Goo! warp your face just by touching it.. plus 10 warp presets to play with.
- 2 Halloween filters
- "Costume Booth" - mix and match hats, glasses, beards for >1000 combinations
- new UI, Icon
- improved face detection
- improved face jitter and tracking
- better blending of faces in mask / photo mode
- video cropping tool
- draw on and add text to your photos
- big update to face editor - much more useable now
new masks, bug fixes & improved image searches
Bugfix
Fixed minor search and favoriting issues.

- new modes
- bug fixes
bug fix
Get ready for Christmas with Santa and Elf masks!

iPad Save Mask Fix.
- world cup face painting!! chose from over 30+ country flags to paint your face and show your football team support

- world cup mode - paint your face with your favorite flag.
- small bug fix.

- improvements to the FX builder effect
- new filters

+ new effects for the holidays!
+ improvements & bug fix to FX builder
+ new effects for the summer time!
updates to editor
